name: Space Station

places.name: Kitchen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the kitchen of the space station, and there is lots of food and water in here

places.name: Radial Thruster
description: short:The fuel and oxygen tanks look to be empty. They need to be filled in order to work...

places.name: corridor with leak
description: short:You hear a small hissing. There might be a leak in this corridor.

places.name: canteen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the canteen of the space station. There is more food and water in here.

places.name: pantry door
description: short:There is a locked door stopping you from entering the pantry. There is likely more food and water, or perhaps other things...

places.name: pantry
descriptions: short:This is the pantry of the space station. There are tons of food and water in here.

places.name: hybernation room
descriptions: short:This appears to be the hibernation room. There are hundreds of pods stacked against the walls in here. Everyone is dead, their pods have a stab mark and a red X on it...

places.name: canteen
descriptions: short:This appears to be the canteen of the space station. There is more food and water in here.

places.name: entry to level 2
descriptions: short:It is an empty room, and there is a corridor leading to level two above you. It is blocked by some debris.

places.name: level 2 door
description: short:There is a pile of debris blocking the corridor to level two of the station. You need some kind of high power torch to bust through it.

places.name: map room
descriptions: short:There appears to be hologram of the first level of the space station.

places.name: electrical room
descriptions: short:This is the electrical room of the space station. There are lots of panels and some electrical equipment in here.

places.name: electrical room door
description: short:There is a lock on the door to the electrical room. You might need a keycard to get in.

places.name: north west control room
descriptions: short:This appears to the North West Control Room for the space station. There are lots of broken monitors in here, all marked with red Xs...

places.name: south west control room
descriptions: short:This is the South West Control Room. There are lots of weapon monitors in here. Curiously, they are fully functional and unharmed.

places.name: fitness room
descriptions: short:It definitely looks like a space fitness room in here. There are lots of bungees for strength training, and a space treadmill.

places.name: engine room
descriptions: short:This appears to be the engineering part of the space station. This room might be useful to re-enable the thrusters...

places.name: engine room door
description: short:This door appears to be blocking the way to the engine room. You might need a keycard to enter...

places.name: north east control room
descriptions: short:This is the North East Control Room. There are more monitors in here, presumably for controlling life support. They are damaged, but still functional.

places.name: south east control room
descriptions: short:This is the South East Control Room. There is a big screen on the wall, it used to be used for displaying what the station's sensors detect, but it is too heavily damaged to be used.

places.name: washroom
descriptions: short:It looks like a washroom in here. There appears to be a cupboard with some first aid materials in it.

places.name: Radial Thruster
description: short:The fuel and oxygen tanks look to be empty. They need to be filled in order to work...

places.name: sketchy spacesuit room
description: short:This room looks like it used to be one of the spacesuit rooms of the space station. However, everything in here looks somewhat damaged...

places.name: map room
descriptions: short:There appears to be hologram of the first level of the space station.

places.name: level 2 corridor
description: short:This is the corridor that leads to level two.

places.name: washroom
descriptions: short:It looks like a washroom in here. There appears to be a cupboard with some first aid materials in it, maybe some gloves too.

places.name: spacesuit room
description: short:This is the spacesuit room of the space station. Most of the spacesuits appear to be undamaged and functional.

places.name: west sleeping quarters
description: short:These used to be the sleeping quarters for the crew of the space station. All the beds look like they've never been used in a hundred years. Judging by what you saw in the hibernation room, nobody will be needing them.

places.name: entry to level 1
descriptions: short:It is an empty room, and there is a corridor leading to level one below you.

places.name: escape pod door
description: short:There is a door blocking the way to the escape pod. You will need a keycard if you want to enter.

places.name: escape pod
descriptions: short:This is the escape pod of the space station. It looks mostly intact, but there is only enough fuel in it to land it from orbit, and there is no obvious way to refuel it. You will get stranded if you use it in deep space.

places.name: viewing room
descriptions: short:This room has lots of windows in it. All you can see. It looks mostly intact, but there is only enough fuel in it to land it from orbit, and there is no obvious way to refuel it. You will get stranded if you use it in deep space.
